workout_plan.description: This workout plan is designed for intermediate users focusing on strength exercises for the push muscle groups, specifically targeting the chest and triceps. It follows a push, pull, legs split routine, with today's focus on the push day.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: The bench press is a classic compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps. It is performed by lying on a bench and pushing the weight upwards using your chest and triceps.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: Tricep dips are a bodyweight exercise that strengthen and tone the triceps. They are performed by supporting your bodyweight on parallel bars and lowering your body by bending your elbows.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.description: The incline dumbbell press targets the upper chest and triceps. It is performed on an incline bench using dumbbells, focusing on the upper portion of the chest.
